verses.verse: וַֽיְהִי֙ <WH1961> came מֵאַ֣חֲרֵי <WH310> And it came to pass after this כֵ֔ן <WH3651> this וַיַּ֤עַשׂ <WH6213> prepared לוֹ֙ אַבְשָׁל֔וֹם <WH53> that Absalom מֶרְכָּבָ֖ה <WH4818> him chariots וְסֻסִ֑ים <WH5483> and horses וַחֲמִשִּׁ֥ים <WH2572> and fifty אִ֖ישׁ <WH376> men רָצִ֥ים <WH7323> to run לְפָנָֽיו׃ <WH6440> before

וְהִשְׁכִּים֙ <WH7925> rose up early אַבְשָׁל֔וֹם <WH53> And Absalom וְעָמַ֕ד <WH5975> and stood עַל־ <WH5921> and יַ֖ד <WH3027> beside דֶּ֣רֶךְ <WH1870> the way הַשָּׁ֑עַר <WH8179> of the gate וַיְהִ֡י <WH1961> had כָּל־ <WH3605> any הָאִ֣ישׁ <WH376> and it was [so] that when any man אֲשֶֽׁר־ <WH834> after יִהְיֶה־ <WH1961> had לּוֹ־ רִיב֩ <WH7379> that had a controversy לָב֨וֹא <WH935> came אֶל־ <WH413> to הַמֶּ֜לֶךְ <WH4428> to the king לַמִּשְׁפָּ֗ט <WH4941> for judgment וַיִּקְרָ֨א <WH7121> called אַבְשָׁל֤וֹם <WH53> then Absalom אֵלָיו֙ <WH413> to him וַיֹּ֗אמֶר <WH559> unto him and said אֵֽי־ <WH335> Of what מִזֶּ֥ה <WH2088> he עִיר֙ <WH5892> city אַ֔תָּה <WH859> you וַיֹּ֕אמֶר <WH559> [art] thou? And he said מֵאַחַ֥ד <WH259> [is] of one שִׁבְטֵֽי־ <WH7626> of the tribes יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel עַבְדֶּֽךָ׃ <WH5650> Thy servant

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said אֵלָיו֙ <WH413> then אַבְשָׁל֔וֹם <WH53> And Absalom רְאֵ֥ה <WH7200> unto him See דְבָרֶ֖ךָ <WH1697> thy matters טוֹבִ֣ים <WH2896> [are] good וּנְכֹחִ֑ים <WH5228> and right וְשֹׁמֵ֥עַ <WH8085> to hear אֵין־ <WH369> no לְךָ֖ מֵאֵ֥ת <WH853> הַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <WH4428> but [there is] no man [deputed] of the king

וַיֹּ֙אמֶר֙ <WH559> said אַבְשָׁל֔וֹם <WH53> Absalom מִי־ <WH4310> Oh יְשִׂמֵ֥נִי <WH7760> moreover Oh that I were made שֹׁפֵ֖ט <WH8199> judge בָּאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> in the land וְעָלַ֗י <WH5921> and יָב֥וֹא <WH935> might come כָּל־ <WH3605> every אִ֛ישׁ <WH376> that every man אֲשֶֽׁר־ <WH834> who יִהְיֶה־ <WH1961> has לּוֹ־ רִ֥יב <WH7379> which hath any suit וּמִשְׁפָּ֖ט <WH4941> or cause וְהִצְדַּקְתִּֽיו׃ <WH6663> unto me and I would do him justice

וְהָיָה֙ <WH1961> become בִּקְרָב־ <WH7126> came nigh אִ֔ישׁ <WH376> And it was [so] that when any man לְהִשְׁתַּחֲוֹ֖ת <WH7812> [to him] to do him obeisance ל֑וֹ וְשָׁלַ֧ח <WH7971> he put forth אֶת־ <WH853> יָד֛וֹ <WH3027> his hand וְהֶחֱזִ֥יק <WH2388> and took ל֖וֹ וְנָ֥שַׁק <WH5401> him and kissed לֽוֹ׃

וַיַּ֨עַשׂ <WH6213> did אַבְשָׁל֜וֹם <WH53> Absalom כַּדָּבָ֤ר <WH1697> And on this manner הַזֶּה֙ <WH2088> this לְכָל־ <WH3605> all יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> to all Israel אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> who יָבֹ֥אוּ <WH935> that came לַמִּשְׁפָּ֖ט <WH4941> for judgment אֶל־ <WH413> to הַמֶּ֑לֶךְ <WH4428> to the king וַיְגַנֵּב֙ <WH1589> stole אַבְשָׁל֔וֹם <WH53> so Absalom אֶת־ <WH853> לֵ֖ב <WH3820> the hearts אַנְשֵׁ֥י <WH376> of the men יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> of Israel פ

וַיְהִ֕י <WH1961> came מִקֵּ֖ץ <WH7093> And it came to pass after אַרְבָּעִ֣ים <WH705> forty שָׁנָ֑ה <WH8141> years וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> said אַבְשָׁלוֹם֙ <WH53> that Absalom אֶל־ <WH413> to הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <WH4428> unto the king אֵ֣לֲכָה <WH1980> go נָּ֗א <WH4994> Please וַאֲשַׁלֵּ֛ם <WH7999> and pay אֶת־ <WH853> נִדְרִ֛י <WH5088> my vow אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which נָדַ֥רְתִּי <WH5087> which I have vowed לַֽיהוָ֖ה <WH3068> unto the LORD בְּחֶבְרֽוֹן׃ <WH2275> in Hebron

כִּי־ <WH3588> for נֵ֙דֶר֙ <WH5088> a vow נָדַ֣ר <WH5087> vowed עַבְדְּךָ֔ <WH5650> For thy servant בְּשִׁבְתִּ֥י <WH3427> while I abode בִגְשׁ֛וּר <WH1650> at Geshur בַּאֲרָ֖ם <WH758> in Syria לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> saying אִם־ <WH518> If [יְשִׁיב כ] (יָשֹׁ֨וב <WH7725> shall indeed ק) יְשִׁיבֵ֤נִי <WH7725> shall indeed יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> If the LORD יְר֣וּשָׁלִַ֔ם <WH3389> indeed to Jerusalem וְעָבַדְתִּ֖י <WH5647> then I will serve אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> the LORD

וַיֹּֽאמֶר־ <WH559> said ל֥וֹ הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <WH4428> And the king לֵ֣ךְ <WH1980> Go בְּשָׁל֑וֹם <WH7965> in peace וַיָּ֖קָם <WH6965> So he arose וַיֵּ֥לֶךְ <WH1980> and went חֶבְרֽוֹנָה׃ <WH2275> to Hebron פ

וַיִּשְׁלַ֤ח <WH7971> sent אַבְשָׁלוֹם֙ <WH53> But Absalom מְרַגְּלִ֔ים <WH7270> spies בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all שִׁבְטֵ֥י <WH7626> throughout all the tribes יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> saying כְּשָׁמְעֲכֶם֙ <WH8085> As soon as ye hear אֶת־ <WH853> ק֣וֹל <WH6963> the sound הַשֹּׁפָ֔ר <WH7782> of the trumpet וַאֲמַרְתֶּ֕ם <WH559> then ye shall say מָלַ֥ךְ <WH4427> reigneth אַבְשָׁל֖וֹם <WH53> Absalom בְּחֶבְרֽוֹן׃ <WH2275> in Hebron

וְאֶת־ <WH854> with אַבְשָׁל֗וֹם <WH53> And with Absalom הָלְכ֞וּ <WH1980> went מָאתַ֤יִם <WH3967> two hundred אִישׁ֙ <WH376> men מִיר֣וּשָׁלִַ֔ם <WH3389> out of Jerusalem קְרֻאִ֖ים <WH7121> [that were] called וְהֹלְכִ֣ים <WH1980> and they went לְתֻמָּ֑ם <WH8537> in their simplicity וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> did not יָדְע֖וּ <WH3045> and they knew כָּל־ <WH3605> any דָּבָֽר׃ <WH1697> not any thing

וַיִּשְׁלַ֣ח <WH7971> sent אַ֠בְשָׁלוֹם <WH53> And Absalom אֶת־ <WH853> אֲחִיתֹ֨פֶל <WH302> for Ahithophel הַגִּֽילֹנִ֜י <WH1526> the Gilonite יוֹעֵ֣ץ <WH3289> counsellor דָּוִ֗ד <WH1732> David's מֵֽעִירוֹ֙ <WH5892> from his city מִגִּלֹ֔ה <WH1542> [even] from Giloh בְּזָבְח֖וֹ <WH2076> while he offered אֶת־ <WH853> הַזְּבָחִ֑ים <WH2077> sacrifices וַיְהִ֤י <WH1961> become הַקֶּ֙שֶׁר֙ <WH7195> And the conspiracy אַמִּ֔ץ <WH533> was strong וְהָעָ֛ם <WH5971> for the people הוֹלֵ֥ךְ <WH1980> continually וָרָ֖ב <WH7227> increased אֶת־ <WH854> with אַבְשָׁלֽוֹם׃ <WH53> with Absalom

וַיָּבֹא֙ <WH935> And there came הַמַּגִּ֔יד <WH5046> a messenger אֶל־ <WH413> to דָּוִ֖ד <WH1732> to David לֵאמֹ֑ר <WH559> saying הָיָ֛ה <WH1961> become לֶב־ <WH3820> The hearts אִ֥ישׁ <WH376> of the men יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel אַחֲרֵ֥י <WH310> are after אַבְשָׁלֽוֹם׃ <WH53> Absalom

וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> said דָּ֠וִד <WH1732> And David לְכָל־ <WH3605> to all עֲבָדָ֨יו <WH5650> unto all his servants אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> who אִתּ֤וֹ <WH854> at בִירוּשָׁלִַ֙ם֙ <WH3389> that [were] with him at Jerusalem ק֣וּמוּ <WH6965> Arise וְנִבְרָ֔חָה <WH1272> and let us flee כִּ֛י <WH3588> for לֹא־ <WH3808> for none תִֽהְיֶה־ <WH1961> become לָּ֥נוּ פְלֵיטָ֖ה <WH6413> for we shall not [else] escape מִפְּנֵ֣י <WH6440> from אַבְשָׁל֑וֹם <WH53> Absalom מַהֲר֣וּ <WH4116> make speed לָלֶ֗כֶת <WH1980> Go פֶּן־ <WH6435> or יְמַהֵ֤ר <WH4116> us suddenly וְהִשִּׂגָ֙נוּ֙ <WH5381> lest he overtake וְהִדִּ֤יחַ <WH5080> and bring עָלֵ֙ינוּ֙ <WH5921> and אֶת־ <WH853> הָ֣רָעָ֔ה <WH7451> evil וְהִכָּ֥ה <WH5221> upon us and smite הָעִ֖יר <WH5892> the city לְפִי־ <WH6310> with the edge חָֽרֶב׃ <WH2719> of the sword

וַיֹּאמְר֥וּ <WH559> said עַבְדֵֽי־ <WH5650> servants הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <WH4428> And the king's אֶל־ <WH413> to הַמֶּ֑לֶךְ <WH4428> unto the king כְּכֹ֧ל <WH3605> all manner אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after יִבְחַ֛ר <WH977> shall appoint אֲדֹנִ֥י <WH113> [are ready to do] whatsoever my lord הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <WH4428> the king הִנֵּ֥ה <WH2009> Behold עֲבָדֶֽיךָ׃ <WH5650> Behold thy servants

וַיֵּצֵ֥א <WH3318> went forth הַמֶּ֛לֶךְ <WH4428> And the king וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all בֵּית֖וֹ <WH1004> and all his household בְּרַגְלָ֑יו <WH7272> after וַיַּעֲזֹ֣ב <WH5800> left הַמֶּ֗לֶךְ <WH4428> him And the king אֵ֣ת <WH853> עֶ֧שֶׂר <WH6235> ten נָשִׁ֛ים <WH802> women פִּֽלַגְשִׁ֖ים <WH6370> [which were] concubines לִשְׁמֹ֥ר <WH8104> to keep הַבָּֽיִת׃ <WH1004> the house

וַיֵּצֵ֥א <WH3318> went forth הַמֶּ֛לֶךְ <WH4428> And the king וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all הָעָ֖ם <WH5971> and all the people בְּרַגְלָ֑יו <WH7272> after וַיַּעַמְד֖וּ <WH5975> him and tarried בֵּ֥ית הַמֶּרְחָֽק׃ <WH1023> Beth-ham-Merchak

וְכָל־ <WH3605> now all עֲבָדָיו֙ <WH5650> And all his servants עֹבְרִ֣ים <WH5674> passed on עַל־ <WH5921> and יָד֔וֹ <WH3027> beside וְכָל־ <WH3605> all הַכְּרֵתִ֖י <WH3774> him and all the Cherethites וְכָל־ <WH3605> all הַפְּלֵתִ֑י <WH6432> and all the Pelethites וְכָֽל־ <WH3605> and all הַגִּתִּ֞ים <WH1663> and all the Gittites שֵׁשׁ־ <WH8337> six מֵא֣וֹת <WH3967> hundred אִ֗ישׁ <WH376> men אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> who בָּ֤אוּ <WH935> which came בְרַגְלוֹ֙ <WH7272> after מִגַּ֔ת <WH1661> him from Gath עֹבְרִ֖ים <WH5674> passed on עַל־ <WH5921> on פְּנֵ֥י <WH6440> before הַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <WH4428> the king

וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> Then said הַמֶּ֙לֶךְ֙ <WH4428> the king אֶל־ <WH413> to אִתַּ֣י <WH863> to Ittai הַגִּתִּ֔י <WH1663> the Gittite לָ֧מָּה <WH4100> Why תֵלֵ֛ךְ <WH1980> go גַּם־ <WH1571> also אַתָּ֖ה <WH859> you אִתָּ֑נוּ <WH854> for שׁ֣וּב <WH7725> thou also with us? return וְשֵׁ֤ב <WH3427> and abide עִם־ <WH5973> with הַמֶּ֙לֶךְ֙ <WH4428> with the king כִּֽי־ <WH3588> are a נָכְרִ֣י <WH5237> for thou [art] a stranger אַ֔תָּה <WH859> you וְגַם־ <WH1571> and also גֹּלֶ֥ה <WH1540> and also an exile אַתָּ֖ה <WH859> your own לִמְקוֹמֶֽךָ׃ <WH4725> to thy place

תְּמ֣וֹל ׀ <WH8543> [but] yesterday בּוֹאֶ֗ךָ <WH935> Whereas thou camest וְהַיּ֞וֹם <WH3117> should I this day [אֲנֹועֲךָ כ] (אֲנִֽיעֲךָ֤ <WH5128> continually ק) עִמָּ֙נוּ֙ <WH5973> with לָלֶ֔כֶת <WH1980> with us? seeing I go וַאֲנִ֣י <WH589> I הוֹלֵ֔ךְ <WH1980> go עַ֥ל <WH5921> and אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> while אֲנִ֖י <WH589> I הוֹלֵ֑ךְ <WH1980> go שׁ֣וּב <WH7725> whither I may return וְהָשֵׁ֧ב <WH7725> thou and take back אֶת־ <WH853> אַחֶ֛יךָ <WH251> thy brethren עִמָּ֖ךְ <WH5973> with חֶ֥סֶד <WH2617> mercy וֶאֱמֶֽת׃ <WH571> and truth

וַיַּ֧עַן <WH6030> answered אִתַּ֛י <WH863> And Ittai אֶת־ <WH853> הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <WH4428> the king וַיֹּאמַ֑ר <WH559> and said חַי־ <WH2416> liveth יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> [As] the LORD וְחֵי֙ <WH2416> liveth אֲדֹנִ֣י <WH113> and [as] my lord הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <WH4428> the king כִּ֠י <WH3588> also אִם־ <WH518> may be whether בִּמְק֞וֹם <WH4725> surely in what place אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> after יִֽהְיֶה־ <WH1961> become שָּׁ֣ם ׀ <WH8033> there אֲדֹנִ֣י <WH113> my lord הַמֶּ֗לֶךְ <WH4428> the king אִם־ <WH518> or לְמָ֙וֶת֙ <WH4194> shall be whether in death אִם־ <WH518> or לְחַיִּ֔ים <WH2416> or life כִּי־ <WH3588> also שָׁ֖ם <WH8033> there יִהְיֶ֥ה <WH1961> become עַבְדֶּֽךָ׃ <WH5650> even there also will thy servant
